Name: Mummiform shabti for Nest-nebt-isheru
Description: This mummiform shabti is made of deep blue glazed faience. The details and the inscription were added in black paint. There are eight columns of inscription, starting on the right under the left arm. Nest-nebt-isheru was the daughter of Pinudjem II and Nes-Khons. Her body was found in the cachette at Deir el-Bahari.
